alert.note: Alert for Otero Mesa; Southern Tularosa Basin (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 11 at 8:01PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Otero and northern Hudspeth Counties through 845 PM MDT... At 801 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong outflow boundary along a line extending from 13 miles southeast of Orogrande to 7 miles northwest of Cornudas to 8 miles east of Salt Flat. Movement was southwest at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Loma Linda, Desert Haven, Cornudas, Salt Flat, Sunset Ranches, Cornudas Mountains, and The Otero Mesa. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
